column3: `multi67()` or something doesn't sound like a bad idea to consider supporting in the future

@sipa any thoughts on such a `multi67()` descriptor? It seems that at least Electrum and ColdCard use [BIP67](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0067.mediawiki) in the wild. It would be the same as `multi()` but at every index the public keys are ordered canonically.

I think adding a multi_bip67 descriptor fragment or so makes perfect sense; it's easy to do, and composes fine with other things.\n\nOne issue is that the script-to-descriptor inference code cannot guess multi vs multi_bip67.
@achow101 textually committed to trying to get an implementation out
